name: PillBox (PMGames)
description:
This is an easy to play and entertaining multiplayer FPS Game to play with your friends. There are 9 unique maps you can select when you make a room, also 6 unique playable skins you can choose from. There are 5 destructive weapons in your grasp. Jump in and see who's the strongest in PillBox.

This is my first FPS Game, and it would be greatly appreciated if you could leave suggestions/feedback after playing. It would allow me to improve from a player's perspective.
